name: Variable folders
description: Adds folders to the Variables category. To create a folder, right click any variable in the block palette and click "Add to folder". Click a folder to open or close it. Right click a variable in a folder to move it to another folder or remove it from its folder. This feature works by adding a comment to your sprites containing the folder data.

info.text: Users with this addon enabled will be able to see the folders in your project. Anyone else will see variable lists normally (no folders).
Some project.json compression utilities might remove the variable folders.
